title: Laughing Planet Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Quirky cafe originating from Oregon with multiple locations; this one opened spring 2014. Offers a vegetarian and vegan friendly menu with bowls, burritos, quesadilla, soups, salads, steamed veggies, smoothies, and juices. Has tofu and tempeh add-ons. Substitute vegan cheese for a charge. Order at the counter.
